name: Password Policy
title: Password Policy
body:
Original Confluence URL: https://qbdocs.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/IAM/pages/1077740348 - please cross-check the quality of the ZD article with the Confluence counterpart and remove this line before publishing the ZD article

Password policies are mostly self-explanatory.

There are just a few limitations:

Locking of accounts should be used carefully. SMS recovery might not be supported due to legal reasons and the security question will most likely be disabled in the production environment. This means unlocking accounts might involve our support every time.
